target_chunk_texts: Every morning he takes the elevator down to the ground floor to go to work.
In the evening, when he returns from work, he takes the elevator to the 7th floor and then walks up the stairs for the remaining three floors to his apartment.
clean_answer:
The man does this because the elevator only stops at the 7th floor during normal times, so he takes it there and walks up. On rainy days or when others are in the elevator, it goes directly to the 10th floor, so he takes it all the way.

DONE.

On rainy days or when there are people in the elevator, it goes directly to the 10th floor. So he doesn't have to walk up in those cases.
